title: France opposes Commission’s plan to rewrite EU privacy rules
summary_full: Paris isn't a fan of bid to change the definition of personal data in the General Data Protection Regulation, or other proposed privacy tweaks
summary_public: Paris isn't a fan of bid to change the definition of personal data in the General Data Protection Regulation, or other proposed privacy tweaks

FR.label: negative
